name: vibecord
description: Discord bot runtime for Codex session operations

scripts.build:binary: sh -c 'TARGET=${VIBECORD_BINARY_TARGET:-bun-linux-x64}; bun build index.ts --compile --target "$TARGET" --outfile dist/vibecord && chmod +x dist/vibecord'
scripts.prepack: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && npm run build:binary
